DataElement.preferredName: MASCC Antiemesis Tool Baseline Last 24 Hours How Often Vomited Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how many times in the last 24 hours they experienced vomiting.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MASCC Antiemesis Tool Baseline Last 24 Hours How Often Vomited
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess a patient's level of nausea and vomiting associated with chemotherapy._A set of parameters established as a reference to gauge levels of nausea and vomiting._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A question about how often an individual vomited during the specified time period.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer Antiemesis Tool
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess a patient's level of nausea and vomiting associated with chemotherapy.

Concepts.longName: Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer Antiemesis Tool
Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess a patient's level of nausea and vomiting associated with chemotherapy.

Property.preferredName: Baseline Nausea and Vomiting Last Integer::24 Hour How Often Vomited During This Period
Property.preferredDefinition: A set of parameters established as a reference to gauge levels of nausea and vomiting.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:A question about how often an individual vomited during the specified time period.

Concepts.definition: A set of parameters established as a reference to gauge levels of nausea and vomiting.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.

Concepts.longName: How Often Vomited During This Period
Concepts.definition: A question about how often an individual vomited during the specified time period.
